feed.title: Signature and Script Independent Hierarchy for Deterministic Wallets.

entry.title: Signature and Script Independent Hierarchy for Deterministic Wallets.
entry.summary: Robert Spigler, a developer, proposed a BIP (Bitcoin Improvement Proposal) for multisignature and single signature wallets. However, ghost43 and Jochen Hoenicke raised concerns regarding the proposal's impact on single signature wallets. As a result, Spigler has decided to revert the proposal back to multisignature derivations, which he believes will address all concerns. The updated proposal can be found on Github, along with Spigler's personal fingerprint.
